page.title: 06Industry in New Thundersley
page.content: A lot of the industry in the local area is{manufacturing,}and virtually all of this is in the "Manor Road { {Industrial Estate }" The industries are classified as "light" and include box making, car repairs, office furniture manufacture, ice cream manufacture, and aluminium component manufacture. The condition of the factory units is poor, and the whole estate appears to be suffering due to the "clogged - up" nature of the sites. All{communications}with other industries outside of the estate is by road - there being no rail link; however links with{trunk routes}is good, the A13, A129, A130, and the arterial A127 route are all within three kilometres of the factory sits. About 35 companies exist on the estate.
